avatar_gate.description: A backend response.py module that handles events relating to avatar movement and interactions in the game world.

monitored_gate.description: A backend response.py module that handles interactions with monitoring and logging components, for example, when a response needs to be logged so that it can trigger other events.

inventory_gate.description: A backend response.py module that handles game world interactions relating to collections of things, such as what is being carried by another object or handling of market transactions.

gametime_gate.description: A backend response.py module that handles computing, recording and communicating game time information in multiple modalities.

subscriber_gate.description: A backend response.py module that handles keeping track of subscriber and recipient lists.
